content: can be long loose lines you ll be tacking them down 6 go back over with small stitches across the black line around to make the stitches it will secure the long lines do not worry about making them perfect you can place these stitches to hide where your backstitches are 7 fold corners to form feet and sew them into place 8 if needed sew head point down 9 have fun making little creepy crawlies to stuff inside his mouth you can sell items you make with this pattern this pattern is free you cannot sell this pattern you can share this pattern anywhere in any way just please do not remove my contact information © 2014 craftasaurustex formerly nichole s nerdy knots free pattern by craftasaurustex
